Html:
hello all,

When I right click a computer, I can't use the 3 options "show pending updates", "install pending update" and "install this update". they are all greyed.

Do some have a hint to solve this?

Thanks!

I solved the problem by running the EXE "showpendingupdates.exe", I just uncheck "always ask before opening this file" and click run. After this I was able to use the options by right clicking.

Solved
